datafield.subfield: Forschungszentrum Jülich GmbH, Institut für Energie und Klimaforschung-Plasmaphysik, Trilateral Euregio Cluster (TEC), 52425 Jülich, Germany
A Multi-Purpose Manipulator system for W7-X as user facility for plasma edge investigation

• Investigation of edge plasma at W7-X with new Multi-Purpose Manipulator (MPM) • MPM components, functionalities and the unique interface to the probe head • Presentation of the scope of physical parameters • Operational parameters for the movement • Electrical environment for measurements
